title: Wetlands fill and mitigation permits (404 permits)
dataVerified: Applicant, property, wetland impacts, mitigation plan, USACE/EPA
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents unauthorized wetland fill. Domain binding verifies Army Corps of Engineers. Clean Water Act Section 404 compliance. Prevents wetland destruction. Mitigation banking verification.
